item.description:
Spring Scrapfest Scrapbook Weekend April 16-18, 2010

Take a break and enjoy the elegant charm and peace of the Christmas Farm Inn & Spa of Jackson, NH in the White Mountains while scrapbooking ?til you drop! Relax in the Inn ?s jacuzzi or indoor pool, or shop in nearby outlets! Enjoy a charming Main Inn/Saltbox room or book a deluxe suite in the Carriage House, Barn or Cottage. Treat yourself and reserve a luxurious spa treatment specially priced for our group! Prices are for the whole weekend!!
Starting at $239 for the whole weekend with great prices on suites and cottages!! Bring your friends!
TO BOOK YOUR ROOM and REGISTER FOR THE RETREAT CONTACT Laurie
item.name: Spring Scrapfest Scrapbook Weekend April 16-18, 2010
